Why choose us for your VPS?

Cloud-based VPS

Unlike traditional VPS that run on a single physical server, ours run across multiple cloud configured servers, giving you unlimited upscale potential.
And because the cloud is more than one machine, hardware failure won't affect your website or online applications at all.

Superior Performance

Storm's high-powered hardware infrastructure relies on superior 15,000 rpm SAS hard drives as opposed to the slower 7200 rpm SATA drives provided by most of our competitors.
This means your data is delivered faster to your end users and dramatically cuts browser waiting time.

Bandwidth

Many of our competitors charge bandwidth/data transfer usage on top of the monthly package fee.
With Storm, UNMETERED bandwidth comes as standard. No hidden fees – EVER!

10x Faster Connection

Every VPS we provide is hosted on a 1Gbps internet connection.
This means that your web sites and hosted applications are served at speeds 10x faster than what you will usually get with a standard VPS.

Fully Managed Support – Free

Provided as standard. This includes patch management & security updates, network security, and 24/7/365 online and telephone assistance.
No hassle, no extra costs – just good service and the backing of experts whenever you need it.

Value for Money

We've gone out of our way to undercut the competition with a high-quality personalised service that looks after your interests.
Faster data access, scalable feature packed hosting, backed by high-end support, for less.
